value.description: Alfredo Aceves closed it out for his 12th save in 15 chances. The game was halted by rain for 38 minutes in the bottom of the eighth. Surprisingly, Daniel Bard (5-5) had the edge in the early innings in the battle of hard-throwing right-handers.
